A)
98(10)
98/2=49(0)
49/2=24(1)
24/2=12(0)
12/2=6(0)
6/2=3(0)
3/2=1(1)
1/2=0(1)
98(10) = 1100010(2)

56(10)
56/2=28(0)
28/2=14(0)
14/2=7(0)
7/2=3(1)
3/2=1(1)
1/2=0(1)
56(10) = 111000(2)

B)
10(2)
64 32 16 8 4 2 1 
0 0 0 0  0 0 0 0
10(2) = 2

11001100(2)
128 64 32 16 8 4 2 1
  1  1  0 0  1 1 0 0  (2)
11001100(2)=408(10)

C)
48(10)
48/16=3(0)
3/16=0(3)
48(10)=30(16)

156(10)
156/16=9(12)
9/16=0(9)
156(10)=9C(16)

I)
120(3)
931
120
6+9=15
120(3)=15

2110(3)
27 9 3 1
 2 1 1 0(3)
 (27x2)+9+3=66
2110(3)=66(10)
